title: mouse delay in skills
body:
I havnt played league in awhile but in game i noticed a lag delay when pressing a skill down like blitz's grab.

Before it used to point right on my mouse cursor if that makes sense; now when i move it theres a delay between following my cursor.

Did league change how skills move like that?

It makes it harder to grab people because i move my mouse to them and click but the skill is delayed behind and misses

replies.body:
This is likely caused by packet loss or high packet buffering. When your packets (the data that gives the server your actions as input) get lost or severely delayed to the server, it can prevent actions from being taken as you intended them to, or create a large buffer between when you take them and when they show up. I recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
